scripts.start: ./docker-compose.sh && docker compose rm -f && docker compose up --build --remove-orphans
scripts.dashboard:server:build: esbuild dashboard/server/lib/index.js --bundle --outdir=dashboard/server/dist --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.rendezvous:build: esbuild rendezvous/lib/index.js --bundle --outdir=rendezvous/dist --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --external:better-sqlite3 --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.server-libp2p:build: esbuild server-libp2p/lib/index.js --bundle --outdir=server-libp2p/dist --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --external:@canvas-js/okra-lmdb --external:better-sqlite3 --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.server-ws:build: esbuild server-ws/lib/index.js --bundle --outdir=server-ws/dist --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --external:@canvas-js/okra-lmdb --external:better-sqlite3 --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.client-libp2p:worker:build: esbuild client-libp2p/worker/lib/index.js --bundle --outdir=client-libp2p/worker/dist --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --external:puppeteer --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.relay:build: esbuild relay/lib/index.js --bundle --outdir=relay/dist --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
